scenario.name: Channel Test
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:test2@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: guest <sip:guest@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: kartoffelsalat <sip:kartoffelsalat@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:kartoffelsalat@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: excludedUA Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 6000 RTP/AVP 0 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000

ACK sip:test@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: test1 <sip:guest0@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: test <sip:test@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:kartoffelsalat@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
